title: Mandatory Vaccines - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/26/19
itunes:title: Mandatory Vaccines - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/26/19
description:
George Noory and Dr. Sherri Tenpenny discuss her research into mandatory vaccinations against childhood diseases that many parents oppose, how pharmaceutical companies make money by pushing vaccines, and how they may do more harm than good.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
